data.title: Donor Recognition
data.meta_description: PJoin us in recognizing our donors who have generouslyÂ contributed to the Pacific Symphony via cash donations as well as gifts to special events.
data.text:
Individuals

Pacific Symphony gratefully acknowledges the following individuals for their generous contributions as well as gifts to special events.

St.Clair Society ($200,000+)

Bernstein Circle ($100,000-199,999)

Founder's Circle ($50,000-$99,999)

Stradivarius Circle ($30,000-$49,999)

Virtuoso Circle ($20,000-$29,999)

Chairman's Circle ($15,000-$19,999)

Conductor's Circle ($10,000-$14,999)

Composer's Circle ($5,000-$9,999)

Soloist's Circle ($3,500-$4,999)

Performer's Circle ($2,500-$3,499)

Concertmaster's Circle ($1,000-2,499)

Principal's Circle ($500-$999)

Musician's Circle ($300-$499)

In Memoriam and Tribute Gifts
